abstract: Nick Brandt's stark and soulful portraits of African wildlife chronicle a world that has gone from lush to endangered.
snippet: Nick Brandt's stark and soulful portraits of African wildlife chronicle a world that has gone from lush to endangered.
lead_paragraph: We always recommend using the "Full Screen" feature to view photographs on Lens. Here, we kindly demand that you click it.

headline.main: In East Africa, Fine Art Meets Conservation
